definition: Dragon Boat Festival (the 5th day of the 5th lunar month)

sentences.english: The picking time for spring teas in China is usually from March to early May.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，春茶的採摘時間通常是每年的三月至五月初。

sentences.english: In May, we reported about a new album from singer Josh Groban.
sentences.chinese: 五月份，我們報道過一張喬許葛洛班的新專輯。

sentences.english: Spider-Man 3 is due to be released in May 2007.
sentences.chinese: “蜘蛛俠三”預計於2007年五月上市。

sentences.english: A revision of that English book will be published in May this year.
sentences.chinese: 那本英文書的修訂版將於今年五月出版。

sentences.english: Even so, other reports showed big drops in housing sales in May. That followed the end of a homebuyer's tax credit.
sentences.chinese: 即便如此，其他報告顯示五月房價大幅度下跌。

sentences.english: A windy march and a rainy April makes a beautiful May.
sentences.chinese: 三月刮和風，雨下四月裏，五月風光多美麗。

sentences.english: And after April, when May follows.
sentences.chinese: 四月過去，五月接踵來到。

sentences.english: In May, people tour the Gold Fish Pond, offer incense at Zhongding and the Yaowang (God of Medicines) Temple.
sentences.chinese: 五月遊金魚池，中頂進香，藥王廟進香。

sentences.english: Her story and the pictures appear in the May issue of National Geographic magazine.
sentences.chinese: 國家地理雜誌五月期刊登了她的故事及一些相關照片。

sentences.english: He returned on May 10th and flew to Beijing the next week.
sentences.chinese: 他五月十號返回的，第二週又飛住北京去了。

sentences.english: In May 1915, the ship left New York City for Liverpool.
sentences.chinese: 一九一五年五月，這艘郵輪從紐約市開回利物浦。

sentences.english: Great all- China meetings of Party and Red Army delegates were called in May and June.
sentences.chinese: 黨和紅軍的全國代表大會五月和六月間分別召開了。

sentences.english: Side-impact airbags will be fitted as standard to all cars ordered from May 21.
sentences.chinese: 五月二十一號以後側氣囊也成爲所有車型的標配。

sentences.english: Last May, that number was more than six million and rising.
sentences.chinese: 去年五月，這一數字超過六百萬並且還在上升。

sentences.english: Mayday's first performance in November came off very well.
sentences.chinese: 五月天十一月份的首場演出非常成功。

sentences.english: The offering is part of a two-month trial that would begin in May.
sentences.chinese: 在線播放將有兩個月的測試期，從五月份開始。

definition: first month of the lunar year
